items.content_html: A lightweight (5K compressed) reactive UI library via template literal tags.
items.title: Krutsch/hydro-js: A lightweight (5K compressed) reactive UI library via template literal tags.

items.content_html: A lightweight, high-performance DDoS protection proxy with CAPTCHA and Under Attack Mode (UAM) challenges. Built with Node.js and Express, it provides configurable rate limiting, IP-based tracking, and modern UI using Tailwind CSS.
items.title: denigkt/js-anti-ddos: A lightweight, high-performance DDoS protection proxy with CAPTCHA and Under Attack Mode (UAM) challenges. Built with Node.js and Express, it provides configurable rate limiting, IP-based tracking, and modern UI using Tailwind CSS.

items.content_html: AnyGridJS is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/anyGridJs: AnyGridJS is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.

items.content_html: KaliPHP is a fast, lightweight PHP framework. In an age where frameworks are a dime a dozen, We believe that KaliPHP will stand out in the crowd. It will do this by combining all the things you love about the great frameworks out there, while getting rid of the bad.
items.title: owner888/kaliphp: KaliPHP is a fast, lightweight PHP framework. In an age where frameworks are a dime a dozen, We believe that KaliPHP will stand out in the crowd. It will do this by combining all the things you love about the great frameworks out there, while getting rid of the bad.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.
items.title: qodalis-solutions/qodalis-angular-cli: A lightweight and flexible command-line interface (CLI) tool designed to streamline workflows, automate tasks, and provide customizable utilities for developers. Built with scalability and ease of use in mind, this CLI integrates seamlessly with your development environment to enhance productivity and simplify common operations.

items.content_html: A fun side project that serves as an offline alternative to the TDSB Connects app. Built as a Progressive Web App (PWA), it runs locally on your device and doesnâ€™t rely on servers, offering a lightweight, efficient, and reliable experience.

items.content_html: lightweight browser extension that provides a real-time countdown to the end of the year, showing the remaining days, hours, minutes, and seconds. Stay on top of time as the year progresses with this simple yet effective tool.
items.title: firozkhan4/ChaseTheClock:  lightweight browser extension that provides a real-time countdown to the end of the year, showing the remaining days, hours, minutes, and seconds. Stay on top of time as the year progresses with this simple yet effective tool.

items.content_html: A lightweight, customizable menu library for creating interactive user interfaces in userscripts. It provides a clean, modern design with support for various input types and keybinds.
items.title: FrozenProductions/Frost-UI: A lightweight, customizable menu library for creating interactive user interfaces in userscripts. It provides a clean, modern design with support for various input types and keybinds.

items.content_html: A lightweight and intuitive browser extension that visualizes mouse activity patterns as a heatmap. Track user interactions, identify areas of interest, and analyze scanning behavior on web pages with real-time heatmap overlays. Ideal for UX/UI designers, researchers, and developers to enhance usability testing and optimize web designs.
items.title: parhamvz73/HeatMap: A lightweight and intuitive browser extension that visualizes mouse activity patterns as a heatmap. Track user interactions, identify areas of interest, and analyze scanning behavior on web pages with real-time heatmap overlays. Ideal for UX/UI designers, researchers, and developers to enhance usability testing and optimize web designs.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient service for user registration and ride management. It provides endpoints for registering users, retrieving a list of rides, and fetching detailed ride information, built using Node.js and Express with MongoDB for persistence.
items.title: Kimforee/FeryAPI: A lightweight and efficient service for user registration and ride management. It provides endpoints for registering users, retrieving a list of rides, and fetching detailed ride information, built using Node.js and Express with MongoDB for persistence.
